title: Sharing With Brother-In-Law
alternative_title: Sharing With Brother-in-Law ; Compartiendo Cuñado ; 매부 나눠먹기
status: Sharing With Brother-in-Law ; Compartiendo Cuñado ; 매부 나눠먹기
description:
Description :
        Hyunwoo, his twin brother, was the most important person in Yeonwoo's life.He already wasn't happy about the sudden marriage, but to marry a guy who's only got good looks, a cocky attitude, and money?There's no way he could ever support this marriage...!But before he had a chance to object, the two rushed into marriage. Because of this, Yeonwoo constantly wished for his brother's divorce.Then one day, Yeonwoo got a call from his brother-in-law, the thorn in his side.Worried about his brother, he reluctantly visited their newlywed home.And there, Yeonwoo ended up crossing a line with his brother-in-law...Can Yeonwoo still maintain a peaceful family after this?
